The vision was to combine cutting edge automotive design with world class manufacturing to create eSports chairs and accessories that improve gaming performance and endurance. Inspired by performance sports cars, designed for eSports, KARNOX products deliver on style, comfort and build quality to enhance the gaming experience. KARNOX chairs are carefully designed by award winning designers.

settings.title: KARNOX - WE'VE GOT YOUR BACK
settings.text:
The most important thing you have to know about Karnox is that we have a factory and that we manufacture our own chairs. No OEM, no rebranding, 100% us. This means we can insure top quality control and you get our product at the low est price. We have been manufacturing gaming, office and even actual car chairs for well-known brands for years before launching our own Karnox brand in 2010.
In May 2018, we brought our first Karnox chairs to the North
American market. Our chairs are carefully designed by award winning designers. We use only top-quality materials to keep you seated for long consecutive hours while remaining comfortable and healthy. Every chair has been rigorously tested toensure the ultimate experience for you.
